CustomField.description: This formula field displays the job equation for validation and review purposes only. It provides a read-only representation of the logic or calculations used in the job, allowing admins to verify its correctness.
CustomField.formula:
fpro__Master_Object__c + '.' + fpro__Field_To_Update__c +
IF(fpro__Filter_Criteria_Master_Object__c == null, "", ' (' + fpro__Filter_Criteria_Master_Object__r.Name + ')') + ' = ' +
IF(TEXT(fpro__Roll_Up_Type__c) == "", IF(fpro__Static_Value__c != "", "Static Value", "Dynamic Value"), (TEXT(fpro__Roll_Up_Type__c) + '(' + fpro__Summarized_Object__c + '.' + fpro__Field_to_Aggregate__c + ')' +
IF(fpro__Filter_Criteria_Summarized_Object__c == null, "", ' (' + fpro__Filter_Criteria_Summarized_Object__r.Name + ')')))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This formula field displays the job equation for validation and review purposes only. It provides a read-only representation of the logic or calculations used in the job, allowing admins to verify its correctness.
CustomField.label: Equation
